name: National Social Visit Report
description:
HQ0028 v1.0- Last Modified: 20/06/2022
This report list social visits for establishments between the dates specified at runtime.

dataset.name: Main Data
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_VISIT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION AS ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_VISIT_DATE.DAY_DATE AS DAY_DATE, AT_VISIT_STATUS.CODE AS CODE, AT_VISIT_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, COUNT(DISTINCT (BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.OFFENDER_VISIT_ID)) AS COUNT_OF_VISIT_ID, AT_VISIT_TYPE.CODE AS VISIT_TYPE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_VISIT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_VISIT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_VISIT_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_VISIT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_VISIT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.VISIT_DATE_SK = AT_VISIT_DATE.DATE_SK) AND (AT_VISIT_TYPE.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.VISIT_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_VISIT_STATUS.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.VISIT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_VISIT_DATE.DAY_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Visit Date (Start):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Visit Date (End):','D',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */) AND AT_VISIT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter value(s) for Visit Establishment Code:','A','Visits\Visit Establishment Code',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2) */) AND AT_VISIT_TYPE.CODE = 'SCON') GROUP BY AT_VISIT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_VISIT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_VISIT_STATUS.CODE, AT_VISIT_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, AT_VISIT_TYPE.CODE), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DAY_DATE, CODE, DESCRIPTION, COUNT_OF_VISIT_ID, VISIT_TYPE FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: establishment_code
parameters.display: Enter value(s) for Visit Establishment Code:
parameters.description: @prompt('Enter value(s) for Visit Establishment Code:','A','Visits\Visit Establishment Code',Multi,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:2)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE AS BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)
